Articles.Content:
So Far I have tried to get texture replacer to work I am on 1.2.2 but I have herd that it works with latest version of TR I am trying to get Phoenix Industries EVA Survival Suit and Pood's Calm Nebula Skybox and also the reflective "Real mode " Visors which i would like to be a goldenish orange not like I can get just the reflective part working anyways. but nothing works I find the instructions on the page to complicated and the Idiot proof instruction link is broken for me and it says something about a GUI but I cant find one in the game.

 

I noticed their is no GUI also this may help https://www.dropbox.com/s/a5711dk042cpwge/output_log.txt?dl=0
